name: The Reapär: Mists of the Goatman
name_original: The Reapär: Mists of the Goatman
description:
Unleash your inner sound engineer and send out the right sound wave throughout the forest, to scare off the goatman. 

Developers:
Gabriel Ansgariusson
Petter Larsson
Patrik Selleby

Sound credits:
Freesound - "Evil Laugh 4.wav" by Nanakisan
Freesound - "screaming_male_horror.mp3" by GabrielaUPF
Freesound - "Crowd Screaming, A.wav" by InspectorJ
All sounds were edited.
